title: Aviator Watch Faces
description: A collection of aviation themed watch faces designed for Android Wear, and based on the popular Aviator Clocks phone app.  While it currently has 5 watch faces, it will eventually contain watch faces for all the clocks found in the Aviator Clocks app. Each watch face is optimized for both round and square watches, and has either a sweep or a tick second hand.  These watch faces are really badges of honor for any serious aviation fan.Watch Face Themes	★ Altimeter	★ Turbofan Engine 	★ Directional Gyro	★ Airspeed Indicator	★ Rotor Tachometer	★ more to follow...Installation InstructionsAfter installing the app to your phone, the watchfaces will automatically be transferred to your watch.  Run the 'Android Wear' app on your phone, and then tap the 'More' button to see a list of all your installed watch faces.  Select one of the Aviator Watch Faces and enjoy!  If you like these watch faces, please rate us with some stars.  TroubleshootingThe transfer of watch faces from the phone to the watch may take a few minutes, but if this fails, run 'Resync apps' from the Android Wear app settings.  NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0+
descriptionHTML:
A collection of aviation themed watch faces designed for Android Wear, and based on the popular Aviator Clocks phone app. While it currently has 5 watch faces, it will eventually contain watch faces for all the clocks found in the Aviator Clocks app. Each watch face is optimized for both round and square watches, and has either a sweep or a tick second hand. These watch faces are really badges of honor for any serious aviation fan.


Watch Face Themes
★ Altimeter
★ Turbofan Engine
★ Directional Gyro
★ Airspeed Indicator
★ Rotor Tachometer
★ more to follow...


Installation Instructions
After installing the app to your phone, the watchfaces will automatically be transferred to your watch. Run the 'Android Wear' app on your phone, and then tap the 'More' button to see a list of all your installed watch faces. Select one of the Aviator Watch Faces and enjoy! If you like these watch faces, please rate us with some stars.


Troubleshooting
The transfer of watch faces from the phone to the watch may take a few minutes, but if this fails, run 'Resync apps' from the Android Wear app settings. NOTE: Please make sure your watch is running Android Wear 5.0+
comments: Moto360 Sport Looks Great As a pilot and gadget nerd, these hit the spot.  Simple and look great on my wear.  Toughest part of owning these faces is which one to use.             Note to the developers, on the altimeter watchface, make the colesman window be the date to add a little function too!

Pixelated I thought this would be ideal for wear on a Moto 360, but once it was installed,  the watch gave looked nothing more than an enlarged image.  The screen itself isn't huge,  so I'm wondering why a smaller image file would be used.  It had potential.
Awesome app! I have installed several other apps from this developer and the quality of this one is no different. Great work!
Great app Works great, dev very responsive, perfect for me!
Watch faces don't "fit" moto 360 Yeah, its a minor gripe, but with the airspeed indicator, it's pretty apparent, as the green arc is chopped off
recentChanges: - all new watch faces with higher resolution
